Empath::

As she approaches her objective, Empath changes over to beast mode, 
her sleek leopard form replacing the angular jet.  Racing across the 
terrain, she skids to a halt as she comes upon Amperion.  Approaching 
slowly, she inspects the incoherent transformer, wondering if he is a 
friend or an enemy.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Blah I keep forgetting my own storylines. :P
> 
> ::Enertron/Amperion::
>        Enertron kept running as fast as he could away from his 
pursuer, 
> Amperion.  However the feline transformer quickly caught up to him 
near the 
> Maximal base.  He leaps into the air, transforming in flight and 
launching 
> one dagger into Enertron's shoulder.  Enertron grunts and goes down 
hard, 
> hitting the ground and rolling back to his feet.  He turns to face 
his 
> assailant.  Holding the shoulder of his wounded arm he glares at 
Amperion.  
> "Why must you insist on this?"
> 
>        Amperion returns his glare.  "You know full well why."  As 
Enertron 
> turns to flee again Amperion grabs his arm.  The sound of tiny 
mechanisms can 
> be heard as he attempts to gain Enertron's power of energy for 
himself, 
> unfortunately this is less than effective on a living bot.  
Enertron sends a 
> surge of energy through the link wiping most of Amperion's memories 
and 
> leaving him a babbling mess in front of the Maximal base.  Enertron 
then 
> pulls the dagger from his shoulder and drops it next to Amperion.
> 
>        With his pursuer disabled he takes flight heading aimlessly 
toward the 
> Southeast.  His wing was also damaged by the dagger, and thus his 
flight is 
> both erratic and painful.  With one last hurrah he clears a tree to 
land in a 
> clearing.  Unfortunately the clearing is already occupied by the 
Predacon 
> base.  Bouncing off of the base he lands on the ground in severe 
pain.
